content.1: Then I turned, and lifted up mine eyes, and looked, and behold a flying roll.
content.2: And he said unto me, What seest thou? And I answered, I see a flying roll; the length thereof
content.3: Then said he unto me, This
content.4: I will bring it forth, saith the
content.5: Then the angel that talked with me went forth, and said unto me, Lift up now thine eyes, and see what
content.7: And, behold, there was lifted up a talent of lead: and this
content.9: Then lifted I up mine eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came out two women, and the wind
content.10: Then said I to the angel that talked with me, Whither do these bear the ephah?
content.11: And he said unto me, To build it an house in the land of Shinar: and it shall be established, and set there upon her own base.
